name: Dark Sunset
description:
Nigel, a relic hunter, found the legendary Pandora's Box. By accidentally opening the box, an ancient curse was unleashed. Now, Nigel has to survive the incoming waves of demons released from the box. By accidentally opening the box, an ancient curse was unleashed. Now, Nigel has to survive the incoming waves of demons released from the box.

This project is quite old, but I finally managed to complete and release it. It works more like some sort of demo to test the game mechanics. Hope you enjoy it =)

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space (while moving) - Dodge

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Attack

Mouse Wheel, Q, E, 1 and 2 - Change Weapon

R - Reload (Gun only)
